text:
Dallas, TX - Mobile Developer/Manager - Onsite Only
We are looking for high potential candidates who have 5+ years of experience in software development along with some team lead experience (at least two years) or at least one year of Project Management experience. We are a technology consulting firm so there is potential to travel outside of Dallas up to 40%. If you are interested in learning more, please send your resume and contact information to shanna.wright@parivedasolutions.com.
